message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it offers.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While $900,000 is appealing, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.  This is my best offer and reflects the considerable value this product brings.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,050,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $950,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value while also being reasonable for me.
